title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Video creation in Copilot Visual Creator powered by Clipchamp
description: Clipchamp brings video creation skills to Visual Creator in Copilot. Type your prompt and Clipchamp will write a bespoke script, source high quality stock footage, and assemble a video project with music, voiceover, text overlays and transitions. Open your video project draft in Clipchamp app to continue editing, export and share. Great for informational videos, video messaging, how-to, demo and video presentations.
